mainName: St. Herman's Blue Hole National Park

topComments.author: Jordan Foss (JT)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Divertido pequeno parque nacional para explorar e caminhar. A caverna era linda.  (Original) Fun little national park for some exploring and hiking. The cave was gorgeous.

topComments.author: Oz (Sweet Kay Oz)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo este parque. Trilhas e banheiro bem cuidados, pequeno museu agrad√°vel, espeleologia e um belo local para dar um mergulho refrescante. A equipe √© muito simp√°tica e experiente tamb√©m. √ìtima parada no Beija-flor, especialmente se n√£o estiver chovendo muito (o Blue Hole √© mais azul!)  (Original) Love this park. Great stopover on the Hummingbird, especially if it hasn't been raining much (the Blue Hole is bluer!)

topComments.author: Philipk75
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitou o Parque Nacional Blue Hole em 21-06-2022. A piscina real era muito bom. A quadrilha do crime que invadiu meu aluguel e roubou minha carteira e dinheiro, nem tanto. Eu acredito que a prova de treino que o atendente estava envolvido. Eu registrei um boletim de ocorr√™ncia, e eles milagrosamente encontraram minha carteira no dia seguinte na estrada, sem dinheiro, √© claro. Tamb√©m tive todos os meus cart√µes de cr√©dito devolvidos, com exce√ß√£o do meu cart√£o da empresa. Nome diferente no cart√£o, deve ter se misturado com as outras carteiras/bolsas roubadas e na confus√£o de n√£o ter meu nome real nele, n√£o consegui de volta. Eu recomendo se voc√™ visitar, levar todos os objetos de valor com voc√™. √â uma caminhada curta e n√£o vale a pena.  (Original) Visited the Blue Hole National Park on 6-21-2022. The actual swim pool was very nice. The crime ring that broke into my rental and stole my wallet and cash, not so much. I believe workout proof the attendant was involved.I filed a police report, and they miraculously found my wallet the next day on the highway, no cash of course. Also I had all of my credit cards returned with the exception of my company card. Different name on the card, it must have gotten mixed in with the other stolen wallets/purses and in the confusion of not having my actual name on it, I did not get it back. I recommend if you visit, to take all valuables with you. It's a short hike, and not worth the chance.

topComments.author: Sarina Collins
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta foi uma parada divertida no caminho de San Ignacio para Placencia. $ 8BZE por pessoa. A √°gua √© provavelmente 75¬∞. No entanto, se voc√™ n√£o estiver l√° para nadar, provavelmente n√£o vale a pena. Nadamos por cerca de uma hora em uma forte tempestade. Nadei com uma tartaruga e explorou a caverna a jusante do cenote principal. O local possui banheiros e vesti√°rios. Teria caminhado uma das v√°rias trilhas da selva do estacionamento, mas n√£o tive tempo.  Recomendo para crian√ßas e adultos!  (Original) This was a fun stop on our way from San Ignacio to Placencia. $8BZE per person. The water is probably 75¬∞. However, if you're not there to swim it's probably not worth it. We swam for about an hour in a heavy rainstorm. Swam with a turtle and explored the cavern just downstream from the main cenote. The site has bathrooms and changing rooms. Would have hiked one of several jungle trails from the parking lot but didn't have time.  Would recommend for kids and adults!

topComments.author: Tony Lim
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fiz a caverna de cristal (caverna de vacas da montanha) e foi bastante espetacular uma vez chegar √† regi√£o das maravilhas da caverna. N√£o cometa o erro de usar todas as baterias da sua c√¢mera de a√ß√£o antes de chegar l√°! √â cerca de 1 hora de caminhada at√© a montanha, ent√£o voc√™ entra na caverna de cristal que est√° escorregadia de lama e voc√™ deve observar cuidadosamente seus passos enquanto navega pela caverna. N√£o √© para quem tem cora√ß√£o fraco, voc√™ ter√° que se espremer em algumas √°reas apertadas e uma queda pode facilmente causar ferimentos graves. Certifique-se tamb√©m de aplicar repelente de insetos antes de escalar a montanha e depois de retornar √† entrada da caverna. Os mosquitos s√£o malucos aqui, consegui mais de 60 picadas, s√≥ por isso n√£o estou dando essa atra√ß√£o 5/5.  (Original) Did the crystal cave (mountain cow cave) and it was quite spectacular once getting to the wonderland region of the cave. Don't make my mistake of using up all the batteries on your action camera before getting there! It is about a 1 hour hike up the mountain, then you go into the crystal cave which is slippery with mud and you have to carefully watch your step as you navigate the cave. Not for the faint of heart, you will have to squeeze through some tight areas and a fall could easily cause severe injury. Also make sure you apply bug spray before hiking the mountain and after returning to the mouth of the cave. The mosquitos are insane here, I got more than 60 bites, which is the only reason why I am not giving this attraction 5/5.

N√≥s levamos um mergulho ent√£o hiked ao redor da √°rea ent√£o deu outro mergulho para esfriar fora. No geral, um lugar muito agrad√°vel para uma breve parada. Mas eu n√£o sairia do meu caminho para chegar l√° se j√° n√£o estiv√©ssemos indo nessa dire√ß√£o.  (Original) A nice little stop on our road trip to cool off before we got to our next destination.  We took a dip then hiked around the area then took another dip to cool off.  Overall, a very nice place for a brief stop.  But I wouldn't go out of my way to get there if we weren't already headed that way.

Estacionamentos e banheiros est√£o dispon√≠veis no local. #letsguide  (Original) Great area to have a picnic or family fun. The watershed and limestone rock formations are beautiful. However, the water is tempting but if you must do take a towel since it becomes quite chilly after being in the water for some time. Parking lots and bathrooms are available on site. #letsguide

topComments.author: Seth McClaine
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pequena √°rea agrad√°vel, mas estou meio surpreso que sejam US $ 8 Blz (US $ 4) por pessoa. Havia apenas dois caras sentados em uma mesa de piquenique para cobrar as taxas, se n√£o estiv√©ssemos l√° com o nosso motorista de transporte Eu teria assumido que eles estavam apenas tentando nos enganar. Tamb√©m n√£o tivemos mudan√ßas e nem eles. Felizmente, nosso motorista de √¥nibus acabou sendo capaz de quebrar nossos US $ 50 porque n√£o nos deixaria entrar sem receber o pagamento e eu n√£o lhes daria US $ 34 extras. A √°rea era um pouco degradada, mas ainda bonita. Muitos mosquitos, a menos que voc√™ esteja pulando diretamente na √°gua, eu recomendaria algumas mangas e cal√ßas compridas com bastante repelente de insetos.  4/5 para o lado comercial do parque, mas definitivamente vale a pena.  (Original) Nice little area, but I'm kind of surprised that it's $8 Blz ($4 US) per person to go in. There were just two guys sitting at a picnic table to collect the fees, if we weren't there with our shuttle driver I would have assumed they were just trying to rip us off. Also we didn't have change and neither did they. Luckily our Shuttle bus driver ended up being able to break our $50 because they weren't going to let us in without getting paid and I wasn't going to give them an extra $34 . The area was a little run down but still beautiful. Lots of mosquitos so unless you are jumping straight into the water I would recommend some long sleeves and pants with plenty of bug spray.  4/5 for the business side of the park, but definitely worth going to.
